articles.title: Irish land WR Fitzgerald, son of ex-NFL star Larry - ESPN
articles.summary: Notre Dame lands Devin Fitzgerald, son of ex-NFL star Larry Class of 2026 wide receiver Devin Fitzgerald, son of 11-time Pro Bowl selection and second all-time NFL receiving yards leader Larry Fitzgerald, has committed to Notre Dame, he announced Saturday night. Fitzgerald is a three-star pass catcher from Arizona's Brophy Prep and ESPN's 71st-ranked wide receiver prospect in his class.
